named-native-query.name: Sale.totalByMonth
named-native-query.query: select date_format(creation_date, '%Y/%m') month , count(*) total from sale where creation_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and status = 'EMITIDA' group by date_format(creation_date, '%Y/%m') order by date_format(creation_date, '%Y/%m') desc
